feat.name: Deadly Poison Weapon
entries: Your poisons are devastatingly potent. When you apply a simple poison with Poison Weapon, the poison deals {@damage 4d4} poison damage instead of {@damage 1d4} poison damage. When you apply an injury poison to your weapon, the DC to resist that poison increases by 2, to a maximum of your class DC.

feat.name: Decry Thief
feat.prerequisites: Zephyr Guard Dedication, trained in {@skill Intimidation}
entries: When you attempt to {@action Demoralize}, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action's normal effects.

entries.Critical Success: For 1 round, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to Speed and a –4 status penalty to {@skill Stealth}.
entries.Success: For 1 round, the target takes a –5-foot status penalty to Speed and a –2 status penalty to {@skill Stealth}.

feat.name: Know The Beat
entries: You become trained in your choice of {@skill Lore||Guild Lore}, {@skill Lore||Legal Lore}, {@skill Lore||Mercantile Lore}, or {@skill Lore||Underworld Lore}. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to {@skill Diplomacy} checks to {@action Gather Information} and to checks made to investigate crimes.

feat.name: Pesh Skin
feat.requirements: You are transformed into a plant by a polymorph spell.
entries: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it. Each time a creature touches you, hits you with an unarmed attack, or hits you with a melee weapon attack while adjacent to you, that creature takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage.
Increase the damage to {@dice 2d6} if the polymorph spell is 8th level or higher, or to {@dice 3d6} if it's 10th level.

When an adjacent creature damages you with piercing or slashing damage, it must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or become {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1} (or {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} on a critical failure) until the end of its next turn.
These benefits last until you're no longer polymorphed into a plant.

feat.name: Relentless Disarm
feat.prerequisites: Zephyr Guard Dedication, trained in {@skill Athletics}
entries: When you succeed, but don't critically succeed, at a check to {@action Disarm} a creature, your circumstance bonus to further checks to {@action Disarm} that creature is +4 instead of +2. Other creatures gain only the normal bonus.
When you critically succeed at a {@action Disarm} check, you can immediately {@action Demoralize} your target as a reaction.

feat.name: Shaped Contaminant
entries: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

When you activate an inhaled poison, you can cause it to fill a 20-foot line that's 5 feet tall rather than a 10-foot cube. You gain a +3 status bonus to saving throws against inhaled poisons that you activate.

feat.name: Unfazed Assessment
feat.prerequisites: Zephyr Guard Dedication, expert in {@skill Perception}
entries: You have witnessed hundreds of fighting styles and quickly adapt to defend against complicated maneuvers. Choose a creature within 30 feet who you're aware of, and attempt a {@skill Perception} check against that target's Will DC. If you succeed, you size up their fighting style, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against that creature's attacks (or a +2 circumstance bonus for a critical success). These benefits last until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Zephyr Guard Dedication
entries: As a Zephyr Guard, you're always vigilant against crime and threats to the city's safety. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to {@skill Perception} checks against attempts to {@action Palm an Object}, {@action Steal}, or {@action Conceal an Object} (including you're Seeking {@condition concealed} objects). You become trained in {@skill Society} and {@skill Lore||Katapesh Lore}; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead.
feat.special: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Zephyr Guard archetype.
